mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, username, firstName, lastName, email, pasword, phone, userStatus) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pasword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firstName = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastName = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pasword = #{pasword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userStatus = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select userId, username, firstName, lastName, email, pasword, phone, userStatus from user
